<item>
  <title>Slaven Bilic: I will never forget West Ham&apos;s Boleyn farewell - the script was written in the stars</title>
  <link>http://www.standard.co.uk/sport/football/slaven-bilic-i-will-never-forget-west-hams-boleyn-farewell-the-script-was-written-in-the-stars-a3246981.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA[I will never forget Tuesday night.The build-up, the emotions, what it meant to everyone — how can you not remember that for the rest of your life?]]></description>
  <pubDate>Fri, 13 May 2016 07:24:00 +0000</pubDate>
  <guid>a3246981</guid>

</item>

<item>
  <title>West Ham denting Manchester United&apos;s Champions League hopes was most-tweeted about moment of game</title>
  <link>http://www.standard.co.uk/sport/football/west-ham-denting-manchester-uniteds-champions-league-hopes-was-mosttweeted-about-moment-of-clash-a3246896.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA[West Ham's final game at the Boleyn Ground on Tuesday understandably triggered thousands of football fans to rush onto social media and describe their feelings about the Hammers leaving the ground they've been at for 112 years.]]></description>

</item>
<item>

<item>

  <description><![CDATA[Petr Cech believes Arsenal's bid to end their 12-year wait for the Premier League title was marred by the long-term injuries that several of the club's stars suffered this season.]]></description>

<item>
  <title>West Ham&apos;s Dimitri Payet named in France squad for Euro 2016 as Didier Deschamps names two Arsenal players and Tottenham&apos;s Hugo Lloris</title>

<item>

  <description><![CDATA[West Ham vice-chairman Karren Brady has branded the attack on Manchester United's team bus "moronic" and vowed to ban the fans who were involved for life.]]></description>

<item>
  <title>Harry Redknapp: Danny Welbeck&apos;s injury means it&apos;s time for England to call on Jermain Defoe</title>
  <link>http://www.standard.co.uk/sport/football/harry-redknapp-danny-welbeck-s-injury-means-it-s-time-for-england-to-call-on-jermain-defoe-a3246606.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA[It is a huge shame that Danny Welbeck is out for nine months and will miss Euro 2016. He would definitely have been part of Roy Hodgson's 23-man squad and I'm gutted for the lad because he only recently came back from another serious injury and looked really sharp.]]></description>

<item>
  <title>Competition for London talent forces Brentford to scrap academy system</title>
  <link>http://www.standard.co.uk/sport/football/competition-for-london-talent-forces-brentford-to-scrap-academy-system-a3246466.html</link>
  <description><![CDATA[Brentford have closed their academy and restructured their youth set-up because they believe there is too much competition for the best local players in London.]]></description>
  <pubDate>Thu, 12 May 2016 10:24:00 +0000</pubDate>
